result.markdown:
--- title: "Create a Conda env from a requirements.txt file" description: "how to quickly create a new conda env from a requirements.tct file" author: "Jerad Acosta" date: "2022-09-20" categories: [FYI,conda,python] --- Create a Conda environment with all of the packages from a requirements.txt file automatically downloaded ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} conda create --name --file requirements.txt ``` ::: `` is the name you would like to give the environment
`requirements.txt` is the path to the requirements.txt file
